function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Dependence on Bluetooth technology for proximity tracing","Impact":"Potential failure to accurately trace contacts due to Bluetooth limitations","Mitigation":"Use multiple technologies (e.g., GPS, Wi-Fi) for more accurate tracing","Technologies":"GPS, Wi-Fi","People":"Users, public health authorities","Owner":"Developers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Privacy concerns related to data collection and storage","Impact":"Risk of privacy breaches and unauthorized access to personal data","Mitigation":"Implement strong encryption and data security measures","Technologies":"Encryption, secure data storage","People":"Users, general public","Owner":"Developers, government authorities"},{"Description":"Potential misuse of app data by unauthorized parties","Impact":"Risk of user data being used for malicious purposes","Mitigation":"Implement strict access controls and data usage policies","Technologies":"Access controls, data governance policies","People":"Users, general public","Owner":"Developers, government authorities"}]}
